DOC.criteria: Healthy male female Aged 20 65 year old BMI normal range ( 18.5 25.0 kg/m2 ) Having sign his/her consent form Clinically relevant digestive ( include malabsorption major surgery ) , renal , hepatic , pancreatic metabolic disease ( diabetes , hypo hyperthyroidism , hypo hypercorticism ) , determine medical ( screen ) visit standard blood chemistry analysis ( glucose , total cholesterol , ALDL , AHDL , triglyceride , ASAT , ALTI , gamma GT , RCRP , creatinine ) Medically diagnose anemia base blood formula Food allergy , lactose intolerance intolerance milk protein ( anamnesis ) Smokers ( anamnesis ) Pregnancy ( anamnesis ) Under corticoid hormone ( adrenal , thyroid ) treatment Alcohol intake : > 2 unit day ( anamnesis ) Consumption illicit drug ( anamnesis ) Having give blood within last month , willing make blood donation one month follow end study Subject expect comply study procedure , include consume test product Currently participate participate another clinical trial last month prior begin study .
